name: Add records in Airtable from newly created events in Calendly
description:
Every time a new Calendly meeting is scheduled with you, a new record will be created in the Airtable table.

The template expects your Airtable table to have the following columns:
1) Event URL 
2) Event name
3) Attendee name 
4) Attendee email

You need to have a Calendly premium account to create this integration.
